snippet.title: Common'hood Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on Steam today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/962090/Commonhood/

After losing everything, it’s time to start from scratch. Occupy an abandoned factory and craft the community you want to live in, taking it from surviving to thriving.

Common’hood is a community building and economy management game with highly customizable base building tools. The game is set against the backdrop of an economic crash where the player is tasked with building a post-capitalist society. The player is challenged to go beyond survival and develop a thriving community with the odds stacked against them.

Music by:
Selma Mutal (http://www.selmamutal.com/)

Join our Discord!
https://discord.gg/MJc3gmf

Official Common’hood Website:
https://www.common-hood.com/

Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/commonhood/
